alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Kaufman; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 12:15PM CDT until April 13 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CDT FOR KAUFMAN...WESTERN VAN ZANDT AND NORTHEASTERN ELLIS COUNTIES... At 1215 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cottonwood, or 7 miles southwest of Kaufman, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ennis, Terrell, Seagoville, Forney, Kaufman, Wills Point, Mabank, Crandall, Combine, Talty, Kemp, Grays Prairie, Cottonwood, Purtis Creek State Park, Garrett, Oak Grove, Post Oak Bend City, Rosser, Oak Ridge and Lawrence. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection stay inside a sturdy structure and keep away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
